title: ISPGR workshop // Bridging the Gap - Best Practices in Mobile Brain Imaging
text:
Welcome to workshop website.







The workshop will be held on the 28th of June in Maastricht.


The day will consist of presentations, hands-on sessions and discussions. We will cover:



Time
Topic
Speaker(s)
Description
Slides




8:30
Introduction
Vivian Weerdesteyn
Intro to mobile brain imaging and its potential.
Slides


8:35
Multimodal setups
Sue Peters, Vaishali Vinod
Overview of EEG and fNIRS data synchronization with LSL.
Slides


9:10
Data collection
Everyone supported by mbt and NIRX
Hands-on mobile fNIRS or EEG data collection in combination with other modalities.
Slides


10:10
Break





10:30
Data (pre-)processing
Konstantinos Tsikrikis, Joris van der Cruijsen, Tjeerd Boonstra
Example data (pre-)processing.
Slides


11:30
Wrap-up
Sue Peters, Natalie Richer
Pitfalls, practical considerations, and potential study designs.
Slides



All slides and materials will be made avaliable online after the meeting.




The workshop will be take place at room 0.8Rome at the MECC Maastricht, Forum 100, 6229 GV Maastricht, Netherlands.



If you are familiar with using a bike, the best way to get around in Maastricht is by bike. Renting a bike is therefore recommended (Stay safe though!).
